description: artist: Jorge Rivera-Herrans, Luke Holt, Cast of EPIC: The Musical

lyrics.english: I look into your eyes and I
Think back to the son of mine
You're as old as he was when I left for war
lyrics.korean: 넌 꼭 내가 전쟁을 위해 떠나오던 때의 그 애만하구나

lyrics.english: Will these actions haunt my days
lyrics.korean: 이런 행동들이 내 나날을 괴롭게 할까

lyrics.english: Every man I’ve slain?
Is the price I pay endless pain?
Close your eyes and spare yourself the view
How could I hurt you?
I'm just a man who's trying to go home
lyrics.korean: 난 그저 집으로 돌아가고자 하는 한 사내일 뿐

lyrics.english: Even after all the years away from what I’ve known
lyrics.korean: 내가 알았던 것들로부터 떨어져 산 그 모든 세월 이후에도

lyrics.english: I'm just a man who's fighting for his life
lyrics.korean: 난 그저 제 삶을 위해 투쟁하는 한 사내일 뿐

lyrics.english: Deep down I would trade the world to see my son and wife
lyrics.korean: 마음 속 깊은 데선 내 아들과 아내를 보기 위해서라면 온 세상도 내줄 수 있어

lyrics.english: I'm just a man
But when does a comet become a meteor?
lyrics.korean: 하지만 혜성이 운석이 되는 것은 언제일까?

lyrics.english: When does a candle become a blaze?
When does a man become a monster?
When does a ripple become a tidal wave?
When does the reason become the blame?
When does a man become a monster?
(When does a comet become a meteor?)
(When does a candle become a blaze?) Forgive me
lyrics.korean: (촛불이 화염이 되는 것은 언제일까?) 날 용서하거라

lyrics.english: (When does a man become a monster?) Forgive me
lyrics.korean: (인간이 괴물이 되는 것은 언제일까?) 날 용서하거라

lyrics.english: (When does a man become a monster?) Forgive me
lyrics.korean: (인간이 괴물이 되는 것은 언제일까?) 날 용서하거라

lyrics.english: I'm just a man

title: Just a Man
